website_summaries.verdict: These basic nasal strips are easy to put on and remove and are effective at relieving symptoms.
pros: Reliable adhesive doesn't leave behind a lot of sticky residue when removed
Earns praise for improving breathing and reducing snoring
cons: Sizes run on the large side and may not fit well on small noses

customer_reviews.title: Good For Smaller Noses
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like taking decongestants at night when I have a cold and nose strips are a great alternative because they open the nasal passages so I can get air. These work better for my husband, who has a cute button nose, than they do for me. I have a wide flat nose so I need a lot of “flex” up, which means I need good adhesion to grab and pull out to get that good air flow. These performed pretty well but could be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and works well
customer_reviews.text: Allergy season is a pain, these aren't. ;) They stay on all night, come off easy (I use a little water to prevent peeling), and seem to be a good value for my money. My husband says they're helping the chainsaw noise too. Small update. I tried to use some store brand and the brand name ones again since we were at the store and they were easy to grab. Big mistake. The store brand ones left my nose raw and peeling. The brand name ones were "okay" but not as comfy as these. It's worth the very short shipping wait. Customer for the long haul here, thank you!! <3
customer_reviews.author: SisterLilBunny

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: This did not open airways more than a bandaid. There is no stiff plastic ribbing like in the “main” brand of this item. I also use Fitbit sleep tracking and it was as if I did nothing at all vs using the other brand. The difference was obvious. I hate leaving negative reviews but don’t want others thinking this is effective.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: A mighty, mighty nasal strip!
customer_reviews.text: These strips worked great! I've tried nasal strips before and the adhesive would not stay, but these stayed all night long! If you have sensitive skin it may be a little irritating and I felt like the ends were kinda pokey but this works incredible and after a full 8 hours it still had adhesive resistance when I went to pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: meresembri

customer_reviews.title: They're acceptable but definitely seem overrated on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: These aren't that great for nose strips, because they don't hold their shape well enough for a whole night of sleeping! They become partially "deflated" by the morning. There are better options out there! The one positive side is that the adhesion is very good and doesn't leave much residue when you take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Dissolved

customer_reviews.title: I can sleep now!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used name brand strips in the past with little relief but these are amazing! I sleep next to a chronic snorer and these drastically improved the issue. It was so bad I would sleep in another room and still hear him now he has a quiet snore or none at all. Now we both sleep better. Heads up the adhesive on these is supper strong they hurt a bit ripping them off in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: amanda martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are great nasal strips. They work well, are easy to use and packaged in a way that my toddler can't dump them all out at once. They definitely helped to improve my breathing at night, and I feel more rested because of that (which is no small deal with a toddler and a baby)
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Helps me breathe while sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: This is a large box of nasal strips for a great price! The strips are easy to use and apply and the adhesive is strong enough to stay on but isn't uncomfortable to remove in the morning. I feel like my nasal passages are cleared after using these and they help me sleep better when I'm feeling congested! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know I needed these!
customer_reviews.text: I should have tried these 10 years ago. Best night sleep in 10 years. I didn't think they would work that well. Both my husband and I are using them and he's not snoring using them. It's a really great product. They are very sticky and stay on. Remove with warm soapy water. I'm buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Buys Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Bad adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ruined a couple of them trying to open it and stick it to my nose. The adhesive is bad, I can live with it.. but the way it come wrapt and clued makes it very difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief
customer_reviews.text: The strip was very easy to put on, similar to a band aid. I had instant relief once it was placed on my nose. I was able to breath so much better throughout the night. I wasn't snoring, however waking up with really dry mouth from not breathing through my nose all night. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Czarney

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as breathe right.
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all with these, just as good as breathe right at a fraction of the cost. Adhesion is just right, good quality. I've now been through 4 boxes and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Restful sleep
customer_reviews.text: I am sleeping more soundly now thanks to these awesome nose strips! My husband snores quite loudly and just the use of these nose strips help quiet him enough for both of us to get a more restful sleep. I would definitely get these again!
customer_reviews.author: Rini

customer_reviews.title: Save your money & time
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews, these have no flex to keep the nasal passage open & adhesive not good. They are no better than putting a bandaid on your nose. I found some great ones at the dollar store by Assured.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Nasal strips are easy to apply, sticks in easy and lasts throughout the night. It does not hurt to remove. My husband didn’t notice a difference right away, but commented on the quietness at night.
customer_reviews.author: Menytha Denny Grogg

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaper than most other nasal strips and works as well or better than those do.
customer_reviews.author: BEP

customer_reviews.title: Strips melted to wrapper
customer_reviews.text: The strips are comfortable and work but every one I've used so far has been stuck to the wrapper. It's like trying to get the wrapper off of a semi melted jolly rancher. It's very irritating having to peel each little piece of wrapper off before I can apply the strip and go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Disturbedsol

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much these help! What a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Culbertnerd

customer_reviews.title: Helps but hurts too
customer_reviews.text: It is PAINFUL to take off. The corners come off easily but it does help
customer_reviews.author: Amy Foutch

customer_reviews.title: dont like the adhesive
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive does not release and will be returned thanks
customer_reviews.author: Milo1

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it said it would, haven’t snored in so long it’s fantastic! I’ve even started wearing them when I’m just at home on the computer or gaming it keeps the nasal passage open and it’s just relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Gravenson

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: The nose trip is inferior to every l have ever used
customer_reviews.author: S. L

customer_reviews.title: Snored but quieter
customer_reviews.text: I still snored but if I slept on my stomach it was much less with the strips.
customer_reviews.author: corpexcel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are better than ones at store. I forget my husband is in the bed some nights. He ran out of these and used generic brand and there was a noticeable difference. Will be ordering these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: duprey27

customer_reviews.title: Nose strip suck
customer_reviews.text: It does not work! I can still hear my husband loud snore. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ker

customer_reviews.title: Useless product
customer_reviews.text: If you think it helps ! be prepared to be fooled. Don't spend time on ordering and using this product. It doesn't help. I have recorded myself to see the results and it doesn't do a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Manas

customer_reviews.title: Temporary solution
customer_reviews.text: wings let go rather quickly. Does not work all night.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: I woke up with the strip missing, it had come off during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Hard to take off even using warm water to loosen
customer_reviews.text: They work okay, haven’t had any notice in difference breathing yet.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mauch

customer_reviews.title: Did not help
customer_reviews.text: Only it worked on the first day but then i used it 5 times not working
customer_reviews.author: Asish

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Great for pulling off old skin but didn’t work for my snoring
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t work to stop my boyfriend from snoring, and they easily become unstuck
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Hofer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive is very sticky but the strip isn't strong enough to open up the nasal passages.
customer_reviews.author: Une Song

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Did not stick to my nose - waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten C.

customer_reviews.title: Helps to Breathe
customer_reviews.text: The Snoring Solution - Nasal Strips to Instantly Relieve Nasal Congestion - 30 Count Anti-Snoring Strips - Scentless Nose Strips - Keenhealth - Deeper Breath Better Sleep - K-NS-356 are a simple way to help you breathe better at night. Simply remove the back and place across your nose at night. Press hard because it doesnt stick as well unless you do. Helps to open your nasal passages.
customer_reviews.author: lawlf

customer_reviews.title: Snoring Solution - Nasal Strips
customer_reviews.text: These snoring strips were easy to use and did stay on the nose. They didn't do what we would call a real good job. They did work a little, just not enough. The person using them said she woke up more refreshed and felt better, but she still snored off and on all night. If someone knows a snoring strip that actually stops you from snoring, please let us know the brand name and/or give us a link. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Cis

customer_reviews.title: Snore no more
customer_reviews.text: I go through my day nose breathing. However, once I go to sleep, I start mouth breathing, and I snore heavily. After the first night I used this strip, I noticed that my nose wasn't clogged at all. I'm usually congested until I take a hot shower. My wife told me that I slept silently with no snoring. She even recorded me to prove it. LOL. I haven't missed a night since I saw how much my sleep improved. No dry mouth, no congestion.
customer_reviews.author: Mititei

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: These strips really helped me sleep at night with a stuffy nose. It doesn't completely take the stuffiness away but it helps enough to make a difference in being able to sleep. Also doesn't leave a mark on your nose when taking it off and doesn't leave a residue either. Overall it's really great.
customer_reviews.author: brownie24

customer_reviews.title: Comfy nose strips
customer_reviews.text: I like these strips. First time using any kind of nasal strips. Real easy to use. Do not know I’m wearing until I touch my nose and feel it. I think they are working, my husband has not said, “you are snoring” the past few times I have wore them to bed. If that is the case it is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: julia mouser

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This works for opening your nasal passage. I have been snoring very loudly lately because both nasal passages were being plugged or stopped up. This really helps to open them up. This is my second order after I tried these strips and they worked! I will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  Did not stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: I use nasal strips every evening along with CPAP. No matter how I cleaned my nose, these did not stay in place with the ends lifting up off my nose. They are very thin fairly long and the adhesive just didn't work for me. Wanted to return but threw the package box away.
customer_reviews.author: dansb2

customer_reviews.title: A bit useless
customer_reviews.text: The 1st few of these stuck very well and stayed put all night. The issue I had was they provided hardly any lift and didn't make any difference with regards to opening my nasal passages. Since those 1st few that stuck well, I persisted in using them because I have paid for them and have no alternative, now I wake up to them not stuck at all, apart from on the bridge of my nose. Pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Helps my breathing
customer_reviews.text: I have a sinus condition that makes it difficult to breath when sleeping . These nasal strips help to keep my nasal passages open so it's easier for me to breath while sleeping. They stay on all night and are easy to remove in the morning. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Helped me with breathing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about helping with snoring as I do not snore, however as a chronic allergy sufferer I can say they greatly help me breathe at night through my nose! I bet they'd be wonderful during a cold as well!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I can breath better at night
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Breath Right strips but they are expensive so I decided to give these a try. I have to sleep with a Cpap and these strips work really well without the stiffness like Breath Right or Great Value Brand
customer_reviews.author: V. Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to help with my sinus issues. Easy to apply and remove. Did not leave any residue behind. Fairly comfortable to wear but you do notice that they are there.
customer_reviews.author: slm

customer_reviews.title: The cheaper brand is better
customer_reviews.text: They don’t stay on and the cheaper version works better. Not happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Better than the competitor.
customer_reviews.text: I have used breathe right strips for years and I actually like these more. The strip stays where you put it until morning and doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: When you have it on everything is perfect. When you take it off the area where it was is a little sensitive
customer_reviews.author: Jon E. Fleischner

customer_reviews.title: did not stick
customer_reviews.text: the tapes did not stick came off after seconds applied
customer_reviews.author: FG3Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Snoring Solution - Nasal Strips to Instantly Relieve Nasal Congestion - 30 Count Anti-Snoring Strips - Scentless Nose Strips - Keenhealth - Deeper Breath Better Sleep - K-NS-356
feature_bullets: NOSE STRIPS FOR INSTANT NASAL RELIEF - The stop snoring strips help to provide relief from nasal congestion or stuffy nose caused by a cold or allergies.
DRUG-FREE ANTI-SNORING DEVICE - Try the anti-snore strips! A non-invasive method to increase the airflow in your nose to reduce snoring.
PLACE THE BREATH STRIPS ABOVE THE FLARE OF YOUR NOSTRILS TO LIFT THE SIDE OF YOUR NOSE - The spring-like nose strips help to open your nasal passages wider to mute snoring and provide nasal relief.
SNORING SOLUTION - Keenhealth's nasal strips make sure you sleep better and is also the ideal snore solution!

EASILY EVER AFTER - Your purchase is backed by our 60-days, unconditional, easily-ever-after money-back guarantee. We want to make sure you enjoy your product. If for any reason our product doesn’t match your expectations, contact us and we will make things right with you.
